channel.title: Android on Reversance
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Reversance

item.title: Installing and using TWRP Recovery for Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 MTK
item.description: In the last post I have presented you way of unlocking bootloader in Xiaomi Redmi Note 4. Now it is the time to install custom Recovery Image and use it to flash your desired ROM. Remember that to follow this instructions you need to have unlocked bootloader. Warning Custom recovery image will allow you to make deep modifications in your phone software. This includes complete remove of Android operation system (don’t worry it can be installed again).

item.title: Redmi Note 4 MTK Bootloader Unlocking using Linux
item.description: After long and tedious process of unlocking bootloader in my Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 phone using linux, to sum up I decided to write definitive tutorial about it. I have collected all informations that were scattered around internet and gathered them in one place. Note This tutorial is written especially for MTK SOC devices, so if you have locked bootlader on other Xiaomi phone that Redmi Note 4 and it is MTK, then you can try unlocking it using tools and methods presented here.
